entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
